thread.title: Will Ferrell-themed bar opens in NYC
thread.title_full: Will Ferrell-themed bar opens in NYC

title: Will Ferrell-themed bar opens in NYC
text:
'Aladdin' outtakes of Robin Williams... 
Neil told television station WPIX, "This bar is kind of like the place where a 35-or 40-year-old person could come and sit and not be intimidated by loud techno music but still be surrounded by things that are funny and ridiculous and kind of get it," he said. "Thatâ€™s what Will Ferrell has always meant to us."The bar officially opened on Oct. 1 but as the owners will continue filling the bar with Ferrell-inspired items as they get ready for an "Anchorman" Halloween party on Oct. 30. No word if Will Ferrell has any plans to stop by the bar, but the owners say he is welcome anytime.
